website_summaries.verdict: These stylish moccasins for indoors or outdoors tend to run wide, which many wearers recovering from medical procedures may prefer. We recommend ordering a size higher for a better fit.
pros: Stylish and sturdy enough for casual street wear
Good heat retention on cold flooring
cons: Decorative lacing and stitching can wear out prematurely
Sole has a hard rubber layer, not well-padded

customer_reviews.title: Incredible air-inflated insole makes them enduring soft
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave 4 stars since they are a bit pricy for me, thought it is very comfortable. But after wearing them for over a month, I have to raise it to 5 stars. :) There seems to be an air-inflated insole beneath the soft fluffy insole on the surface, which makes it very comfortable. I didn't expect the soft feeling to last very long since the fluffy hair usually would be pressed to flat and then lost the softness in the very beginning. But this air insole do just the trick and make them still soft after one month pressing. Very impressive by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: zengliX

customer_reviews.title: They're very very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: They are fur lined moccasin slippers. They appear to be well made and I wear them all the time. How comfy are they? When they first came my son who's a bit bigger than me 6'3" and 18, to my 6'1" and 63 years old tried to steal them from me and I had to manhandle him to the floor and get them back while I reminded him that this was elder abuse and I'm an old man and I need the extra fluffy slippers. The point was lost a little considering I was sitting on him, but be careful with these. Other family members may try to steal them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. These are extremely well-made for the price. They are comfortable and have a very nice firm no slip bottom. We do not wear our outdoor shoes in the house so my husband wears these whenever he is home. We highly recommend these and plan on buying several other pairs. The only negative is that the drawstring tie is made out of rawhide. This is a problem on two counts. 1) Our cat loves to chew through the ties if we leave the slippers out. 2)The rawhide tie is very stiff and the slippers keep untieing,which is a bit aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Stitching fell apart a week after the 30 day return window. Thanks......
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I considered sending these back. The Size 9 fit my "usual" 8 1/2 foot well, but when I started to walk, the heel was too loose. I could not wear a size smaller, so I decided to wear these with socks. I'm using moderately heavy, seamless socks and things are working out well. The shoes are warm and comfortable. When ( if ever) cool weather comes, they'll be doubly welcome. If one is considering these, remember the loose heel situation. My feet are not narrow. In good shoes, I wear an 8 1/2 D. They're nice slippers, but be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair in about a year and a half. I'm honestly a little disappointed in this last pair.. My first pair last a year, if not slightly longer before the big toe would start an indentation. Similar to my old Eddie Bauer slippers. However, my recent pair lasted right around 5-6 months before a hole was created and the rubber exterior perimeter started to break away. I use slippers all day, everyday, as shoes are taken off at the door for everyone, including me. Very disappointed that the first pair lasted so much longer for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: OK chief

customer_reviews.title: they are smaller than the listed size; material at toes is peeling off after wearing for 48 days
customer_reviews.text: Pro: semi-comfortable if you have narrow feet. Con: The underside material at the toes is peeling off after wearing these slippers for only approximately 48 days. Con: Smaller size than advertised. Con: When I walk, it slips off the heel from my right-foot, yet the left-foot stays in place most of the time. Con: These cannot be used for walking fast or jumping because they don't fit around ankles properly.
customer_reviews.author: Robpluto

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and tight.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband 2 years ago and they were great. Unfortunately the pair that I got him for this Christmas (I ordered identical to last time) and they were too tight and overall small. Going to try again, size up and select a wide width. The only reason I’m going to try again is because he absolutely loved his other ones. Hoping the sizing up will work.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good slippers in wide fitting
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on his 2nd pair of these - last pair lasted about 2 years of daily use in the house. They are warm and comfortable for walking onthe tile floors here at home. The only nuisance is that the leather laces keep coming untied - have have now tried to tie laces when wet so fingers crossed that helps. He has very wide feet and the 4E width works well. Recommend and will purchase again in another 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: mom44

customer_reviews.title: Heel is too wide.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems of excellent quality, but fitting is the issue in my case. I normally wear a 9W so that's what I ordered. The front was fine, heel was too wide, mocs would fall off my foot as I tried to walk. So, I sent the 9W back and got a regular 9. Same problem, front was tighter in the 9, but the heel had the same problem as the 9W, too wide. Again, good quality mocs, but beware that their heel design is wide (and loose in my case).
customer_reviews.author: John  K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of moccasins! I added a supportive foot bed, which worked a lot better for me. Trick to get them to fit to your feet is to tighten the ties a lot, and force your feet into the seemingly too tight result, and then let them form to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Alan Menter

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent slippers. I should probably give them 5 stars. A problem I had initially is that they were too wide, so much so that the heels would drop with every step I took. I hard ordered the narrowest width available because I have somewhat narrow feet. I decided to try using the rawhide laces (which I thought were only decorative) to tighten them and this worked great. They fit really well now. Of course, because they are leather, I know that they will stretch over time. Hopefully, I can keep adjusting them using the laces and they will continue to fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Dom

customer_reviews.title: Suede Leather & very well made
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these slippers for my husband and they are perfect! He's really and 8 1/2 size so these are a tad large(9) but that's also his preference in slippers. They are so well made, nice sturdy sole and quality leather, lining is cozy and warm- - all the benefits of a company who is proud of their product. Would order them again when these wear out but doubt that would be soon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Packer

customer_reviews.title: Meh, Okay I guess
customer_reviews.text: Good color, pleased to see the wide width...I ordered the same as my shoe size with wide width...unfortunately with the thick padding and the lots of the fake fleece (inside) they seem a bit tight...you can put them on when feet are dry, but if the feet are wet or damp, you cannot put these slippers on, no way no how. You can wear them to the bathroom to shower, but you will always carry them back to the bedroom...wish they were available in "half" sizes, perhaps a half size larger than normal might help the fit. I force myself to wear them, but still prefer my old worn out ones as they can be put on after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: They're adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: They seemed a bit too wide even after ordering a smaller size but they were okay. I wore them for maybe 6 months and realized, hey, these are adjustable! Just like tying a shoe, you gotta tighten the leather laces to fit. I felt pretty silly but they fit way better after that. I've worn them pretty much every day around the house for a year but the batting is smashed to paper-thin on the heel and the side stitching on the sole has come apart. I'll probably look for a pair that might hold up longer next time but this was my first pair of slippers so maybe a year is about average.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good but narrow slipper
customer_reviews.text: After about ten days, these are broken in and are pretty comfortable overall. The slippers are very narrow compared to: Globe and Nike shoes or Doc Martens; so make sure to order them wide if you’re not used to narrow shoes/slippers. The little tassels came untied and have continuously be retied daily. These do keep your feet warm with or without socks. I recommend these slippers because of the comfort and quality (for the price) but try to remember to order them in a wide size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin-Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good So Far,
customer_reviews.text: These moccasins fit my wide feet just fine. They are very comfortable and I like the hard sole because I often walk outside the house to do chores. I’ve only had them for 2 days so I don’t know how long they will last. The one thing I don’t like is the writing on the box top “Representing the true spirit of the American Slipper Tradition.” On the bottom of the box it is written “ Made in China.” Really???
customer_reviews.author: King of Queens

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: These Tamarac moccasins didn't last a year before holes developed inside the shoes in the bottom batting. I did wear them indoors and outdoors, so to be fair they got wet from the grass often. I'm going to bye some LL Bean wicked moccasins and see if they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus L Tibesar

customer_reviews.title: Love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased Rockport's similar to these, and they lasted about a year. I needed to get new ones, but were a little pricey for slippers that only lasted a year. I took a chance and purchased these, because they looked similar and was hoping I made the right choice. Well, they did feel a little loose at first, but after tightening up the draw sting, they fit perfectly and feel just as good, if not better than the Rockport's. I've been wearing them daily for about a month now, with absolutely no complaints. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO glad I went with these for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Researched up down and sideways to find the right pair as a gift.... SOOOO glad I went with these for my husband. His only complaint (which is to be expected with this type of slipper..... I have yet to see one that does this) but he had hoped he could pull the leather string to tighten and tie the slipper (for some reason) around the back of his heel. Not sure why he wished they did that b/c they fit great and don't slip off his foot. Only mention it in case someone else was hoping for that as well. Soooo soft, such great quality and stitching, awesome durable rubber bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Happy!

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Comfortable, Warm and well made slippers.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the quality of this product so far. The slippers are well manufactured, comfortable and keep my feet warm. I have found as others have written, they do tend to be a bit narrow towards the toes and a bit wide by the heel. I am a size 8 1/2, so I went up a half size to a size 9, and the fit is comfortable for me even when wearing white socks. I would definitely recommend the slippers, and if there wasn’t the issue with them being tight towards the toes and wide towards the heel, I would have given a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: CJM61

customer_reviews.title: Good Moccasin
customer_reviews.text: Received this on time and packaged well. The color of the Moccasin is a bit darker than shown in the picture but I still love them. I now have two pairs of these in different colors and and construction is very good so will see how well they hold up in the long term. I have already worn them outside and for shopping but the size is a bit big for me even though I ordered a size 8 ( my shoe size). They are a little loose so when I walk in them my heel does slip out a bit but otherwise I am very satisfied with them. Would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael2014

customer_reviews.title: My pair ran too large
customer_reviews.text: Aside from fitting too loose the feel of the sole is different from the other widely known brand I had been buying which takes getting used to. Too late to return I may donate these since having them fall off my feet is unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Skygh

customer_reviews.title: So far, a good moccasin
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with these shoes. Someone in the comments said to buy a size longer rather than the wider version, because the heel would always be too wide. I took a 14 regular instead of a 13W and it fits just exactly right. We will see how they stand up after being used for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: markoinpanama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality better than Minnetonka moccasins
customer_reviews.text: Excellent house shoe that actually stays on my feet. Doesn't flop on my heal with each step. Normally I wear a 15/16 in my regular shoes so I went with a 15 and that was too small pinching my toes. I returned and went with 16 and wow! These are amazing slippers. I had Minnetonka moccasins before this and these are better so far in every way. There is a fair amount of padding in these but I wouldn't say a ton of Arch support. They are still very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good Comfortable Slippers That Slip (at first)
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second pair of these, and they've held up well both times, and stay comfortable until they finally wear out. It's important to note though - WHEN YOU FIRST GET THEM, EXPECT THE HEEL TO SLIP. I thought I had bought the wrong size, but when I went down a size they didn't fit at all. What's happening is the fuzzy inside liner in the heel is a bit too puffy when new, but if you give it a couple of days, it will tamp down into just the right fit for you. Don't give up too quickly, and if they still don't fit after you've worn them for a bit, then return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Finally a fit!
customer_reviews.text: I went through 4 other moccasin manufacturers' products being offered online, all the others were expensive but poor-quality Chinese items that never fit. I have been a size 11 all my life, but according to those people I must be a giant. Finally I ordered Tamarac's moccassin (at a bargain price, too) and they FIT FIRST TIME, both feet, and the are made right here in the USA. Yay. Excellent product. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Lauten

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't keep these on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a size 12" shoe in pretty much everything for about the last 30+ years. I ordered the size 12 in this slipper but kept walking out these. They were too long and I couldn't keep them on my feet. I wore them the entire evening and once almost fell down because the heel flipped off after three steps. Do yourself a favor and buy your slippers from an actual shoe store where you can try them on.
customer_reviews.author: A customer who wishes privacy

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers, but check these notes first.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes: they're comfortable, pretty durable, and warm which is great for the winters. That being said, you should consider this when buying them: -They don't have arch support. If you need arch support either look for other slippers or buy an insert with this. -They're snug. I like the snugness but if you like a little looseness, try a size up or a different type with halves. They will get more loose over time as the stuffing gets flattened. -I'm used to wearing poor shoes all day but you probably shouldn't wear these ones all day. I do, but you probably shouldn't. If none of that bothers you, then these will be fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: teamredafro

customer_reviews.title: My Old Standby
customer_reviews.text: For years when I need to order new slippers I always order those made by Tamarac. They always fit properly, they are well made and last a long time before I decide to replace them, and they are stylish enough that I have worn them outside of my home when I have a short errands to run. I don't have to think twice when it is time to replace some old slipper(s) because the Tamarac will always meet my needs. You can spend a lot more for other brands of slippers, but they will not be a better fitting or more serviceable slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's supposed to be wide. It's not...
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to sell a size wide it needs to actually be wide. It's like, you had one job to do and you blew it. They are far too narrow. I am usually a single wide but at the scale this company is mis-measuring their sizes I would be a 4x wide minimum.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers, good price
customer_reviews.text: Real leather suede uppers, all acrylic lining (but comfy), great indoor/outdoor rubber sole. Normally I take a 9W or a 9.5N. After reading the comments, I ordered a 9W, and held my breath. They fit pretty good all around, just a little tight, but the fleece lining will give a bit as I wear them. Update: 01/02/2020. Had them on two days, now they fit just right... Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.author: Redcoat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality but an alright shoe for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoe but immediately started to fall apart after the first wear. Creasing around the edges is pulling away from the fabric and the fluffy interior of it constantly comes off and ends up somewhere on my carpet in a ball. The quality of this product is not worth the price and the sizing is not true to size. Still is a nice moccasin but it is not something that I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DSheetz

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers a few years ago, and they've lasted until now with very heavy wear. I ordered new ones, which arrived, as usual, within about two days! The stitching was loose on one side...I send them in for an exchange. With usual Amazon customer service, the new ones arrived even before I sent the old ones back!
customer_reviews.author: Craig S. Olson

customer_reviews.title: No Half Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. He wears a half size, but these do not come in half sizes, so I bought the full size larger in a wide. Even though they were a half size larger, one foot still touched the toe, but on the other foot, his heel kept slipping out of the shoe. Also, even though I ordered a wide size, they were still too narrow for his feet. We returned these slippers and ended up finding some really nice slippers at the mall that fit much better and were half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jules1592

customer_reviews.title: My Brother's Feet are size 16
customer_reviews.text: My Brother has had multiple toe amputations from diabetes and while he was waiting for his custom shoes, that took a long time; I purchased these slippers for him to wear. He loved them. In fact I reordered another pair as he wore the first pair down in TWO years. So they lasted a good long time. He is almost 7 ft tall and a very big man. These slippers helped him so much through his healing. Thank you for making such a large size for a large problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made slipper.
customer_reviews.text: I like these slippers. They are swede leather and have a nice warm lining that keep my feet nice and warm which is important because I tend to have cold feet. I often go outside with my slippers on and these have soles that come up higher on the sides than many slippers that help keep water from getting on the sides of the leather upper when it has rained or the grass is wet. These are a step up from the average slipper. I liked them.
customer_reviews.author: 1redsed

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a pair of shearling mocs I can wear
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of mens slippers I've purchased with shearling. The previous two pair (Ugg, Minnetonka) were always too snug, if I bought them in my usual mens size (10 medium), because of the shearling. I got the brilliant idea to buy 10W in mens, and it's been great (I wear 12 Wide in womens). I can wear them throughout the day with no sweatiness or sore feet -- it's got some arch support, thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: seattlewhovian

customer_reviews.title: Get 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: This hasn't been worn by my husband yet, but I really like what I got for him for Christmas. He normally wears an 8-9 slipper in ones that don't come in a specific size. His standard shoe is an 8.5. The 9 was too big and I had to return it, but the return process was easy and I ordered the 8 which is almost perfect - tiny bit too small, but 9 was way too big
customer_reviews.author: S. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are not bad. I wear a 13 normally and these are ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not bad. I wear a 13 normally and these are slightly big. A 12.5 (if they made half sizes) would've been perfect. After walking on hardwood floors the past few days, you can feel that there's not a lot of cushion. Not that they aren't comfortable, however it feels like the cushion will eventually get flat. The furry insides feel nice and unlike some other posters, I don't think these look cheap. I do have flat feet so I was hoping for more cushion though. If your house is mostly wood or tile, then these may not stay comfy that long. They're great on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: TG313

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd wear
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!! bought as a gift for my son he wore twice and the entire front is ripped...
customer_reviews.author: Lynn j.

customer_reviews.title: Tamarac by Slippers International 7161 Men's Camper Moccasin
customer_reviews.text: these are the most comfortable slippers i've worn in years ...right out of the box, they fit as described, and they actually have a sole that appears as well made as the rest of the slipper ... the lining is very comfortable and warm, along with a slightly added arch support... the leather stitching is perfect ... i expect these to last for some time
customer_reviews.author: Dean C

customer_reviews.title: not wide - too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear regular width size 14 shoes. even ordering these slippers in 14 2E wide, they were much too narrow to fit comfortably. length however was good and the overall quality is more than acceptable, even though the lining is now "100% acrylic" and not genuine wool as stated in some older reviews I had read. too bad they didn't fit..
customer_reviews.author: JChap1590

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The laces in both slippers snapped immediately when I tried to tighten them. I looked to see why to find that they both had cuts in them. Had I bought them from Walmart for 20 bucks I would have accepted this, but for $45 I expected better quality. I wonder now what will fail next.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Simes

customer_reviews.title: Second pair success
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that my uncle has had and he still loves them. He has trouble finding ones that fit his feet as his feet are very wide, but these are the best he has found. His other pair lasted a LONG time even though he wears them inside the house and outside in the yard so when he decided he needed a new pair he said he wanted these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ixi's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Slippers are HREAT, but might run a little smaller than shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 shoe so I ordered a size 11 slipper. It was too small, so I returned the 11, and ordered a size 12. The size 12 is a perfect fit!! The slippers are VERY comfortable, and I’m very happy with them!! This was a GREAT purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik, Tacoma, WA

customer_reviews.title: He said they're very comfortable and he's thrilled that I got them
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these! He is always having trouble finding slippers because he wears a 14, but these come in large sizes and fit him perfectly! If anything, they were a hit roomy! I just hope they don't sttetch too much on him! He said they're very comfortable and he's thrilled that I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: an upgrade from your granddad's slippers
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THESE. It was a terribly cold winter. I'm a wimpy, cold-blooded, and chill easily. They keep my feet toasty warm. I prefer to wear them with sox. The sole makes them OK to step outside for (to grab the paper, etc.). Squishy memory foam foot bed is pretty weird feeling, but just fine. The product description say to order up if you are a half-size. I wasn't paying attention, I guess. Return was effortless (THANK YOU). In the long run, I wish I had selected a product made of actual shearling and not freshly shorn polyesters.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael F McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe except for the laces
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are terrible for just one reason....the laces. They come untied very easily and I find I frequently retie them. However, what is worse is the multiple times I have almost tripped over the laces. Today, the laces came undone and stepped on the lace tearing it. They are comfortable etc. and so I have no complaints there. I realized after I bought them I had them previously a long time ago. You can tie them in double knots but them still does not work. T
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers I've ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are far better than the big name brand slippers. In the past I've worn the expensive slippers and worn though them in a few weeks, they were over priced and you really just pay for the brand. Taramac really hit a home run with these, they are fur lined with keeps your feet warm and they are lined so well that the fur acts like an insole, after a few days of wearing these slippers they mold to your feet and you can walk in them with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable. I wear them almost every morning for a ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable. I wear them almost every morning for a month and unlike my previous pair (Craftsmen) they are still very comfortable and plush inside. Also unlike my previous pair these allow me to slip my foot into them. Once my foot is in the slipper stays on (e.g. it is not too loose). My only complaint is that the slippers are a bit hot so I generally take them off if I'm on the couch watching TV. Of course, I'm in California so its really not that cold outside and we keep the house at 68o inside most of the time. Hard to say the slipper is not doing its job when your feet are kept warm.
customer_reviews.author: dmsilva1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my father in law. He really liked it! True to size.
customer_reviews.author: FL Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers! Pay attention to width!
customer_reviews.text: The overall fit was on point, the construction of these are beautiful but the wide width is just waaaaay too wide. Usually wide is best for me since I'm flat footed, but the wide in these makes them barely stay on my feet. However these are still my favorite slippers as they are super comfortable and durable. Just keep width in mind when purchasing. I wear a size 15 shoe in almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: CMunn95

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off?
customer_reviews.text: I literally walked out of size 13, replacement 12's were too small. As other reviews pointed out, size seems to be the problem. The slipper itself seems to be decent quality if you can find one that fits. Typical Chinese manufacturing problem where size just doesn't seem to have "standards".
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but They run small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had to buy extra wide shoes but these fit a bit tight, especially along the sides. They’re very warm and comfortable but they seem to run small.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Rider

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but still too loose
customer_reviews.text: These slippers fit perfectly. However, I will have the same problem with them that I have found with all fabric houseslippers of the same style. I hoped that being made of leather might help. The opening flares out. Regardless of how well they fit the foot, they are still sloppy. If the opening was tighter around the foot, they would be perfect. I am too old to worry about my foot slipping out of the shoe and possibly causing me to trip.
customer_reviews.author: Al Abama

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Warmth for a King
customer_reviews.text: Tamarac had my slipper size in stock so I tried them. After 3 weeks, I am very pleased as I wear them daily in the mornings and evenings. I thought $48 was more than I wanted to spend but if they last for a year or more, I will be happy. Their size, shape, color, and inside texture are like new new (see picture). I like slippers that stay on and they do. I am between a medium and EE width and the 2E were the right size. My only concern is if the tie lace will last and not break apart.
customer_reviews.author: Educator's Comment

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work--returned
customer_reviews.text: These were well rated and I was ready to replace my old slippers, similar style, size 11. All sizing criteria pointed to size 11 for these new ones. On arrival, I tried them on. Very good looking and plush but too wide and long and loose. And they had no arch support and just felt uncomfortable aside from the size issue. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Del S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy&Warm! Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these slippers. I haven't wanted to take them off since I go them! If you are a 1/2 size I suggest getting the size above. I'm an 8.5 and purchased a 9 and they are perfect! They fit a little tight because of the warm fluff inside but after wearing them for a bit they stretch and form very well to your feet. Super comfy and warm, sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for! Also, after receiving these I ordered 4 more pairs as gifts because my family loved them as well!
customer_reviews.author: TVasquez44

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: The fuzzy part inside started to fall apart after about a year. I was pulling clumps out. But more annoying was the laces. They easily break while tying. Not the worst slippers ever, I guess. But I just had to buy a new pair and I did NOT buy these again. Went with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are sized accordingly, I ordered 8W and received 8 EE slippers- was expecting EEE but close enough. The slippers are pretty comfortable and have reasonable arch support. These slippers keep my feet warm and the soft rubber sole is flexible nut, firm enough when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Steinhoff

customer_reviews.title: 2nd times the charm
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 12-13, I ordered the 12's and they were too big. But damn they were comfy. I immediately ordered another pair in an 11 and sent back the 12's. The 11's fit great, a little tight but I expect they'll loosen up after wearimg them for a while. They perfectly compliment the robe I bought and now when I get home from work I count down the seconds until it's acceptable to walk around the house in these shoes and my robe, absolutely perfect during the chilly fall season.
customer_reviews.author: Guy-who-buys-things

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these. The first time I tightened the leather ties one side tore right through the leather. It seemed thin, dry and cheap. These were a replacement for the same Tamarac slipper, but with different lining (I thought). The old ones gave me 2 years of good service.
customer_reviews.author: Jimp

customer_reviews.title: down the street to the market and pretty much everywhere except out to dinner and to church ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Father In Law who is 94 years old and he likes to wear these around the house, outside, down the street to the market and pretty much everywhere except out to dinner and to church cause that just wouldn't be appropriate. He looks really good in them and the old ladies seem to gather around him and chat him up when he has these on. Good thing he is a Widower or else my Mother In Law would make me take them back from him so that the other old ladies don't hit on him and ask him to be their card playing or domino partner all the time..
customer_reviews.author: steven e. bishop

customer_reviews.title: Too big but extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! They are extremely comfortable and look great but run big. When I walk around, my feet slip out the back and it makes it hard to walk comfortably. If you go down a size or two, they should fit. I wear a 10.5 M and bought a 10 in these, but they slip out, so I would recommend going 1.5-2 sizes down.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Desmarais

customer_reviews.title: color in slipper goes by by
customer_reviews.text: as soon as water touches the slipper it washes away. i will add pictures soon, atm not able to because im not on my cell. slippers fit as expected, but whats the point when the water washes the color are far to fast. never had slippers that had color wash out of them before.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: I have a fairly narrow foot. The slipper fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly narrow foot. The slipper fits well around the ball of the foot but was very loose in the heel. I had to untie the leather tie and tighten it significantly to make the shoe hold on the heel. If they offered half sizes, a half size smaller would work fairly well for me. However, most shoe makers today only make average size shoes, so they only fit about 25% of the population well. That is the case with this slipper. If I could find a similar slipper from another company that offered half sizes, that's what I would have bought.
customer_reviews.author: R DUKE FERRELL JR

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Well, almost. They fit well and are comfortable to wear around the house. AND they have enough sole to wear outside. I could use a pair with a thinner lining, so I could roll them up, stuff in my backpack and wear around campsite. But they are great for at home.
customer_reviews.author: richard l. purdy

customer_reviews.title: Like them on the cold floor
customer_reviews.text: Like them on the cold floor, i dont like to wear shoes in the house but i don't mind these, the inside is soft and warm. the soles are soft but they are strong enough to go out to mail box
customer_reviews.author: frank hobson

customer_reviews.title: Great House Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking and very comfortable shoes. They keep the feet nice and warm. The quality padding inside the shoes definitely adds to the overall comfort level. Because of the ice and snow in this area, I avoid wearing them outside. My observation is that they will last longer if I restrict wearing them to inside. You will enjoy these house shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Seeker707

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - some people say they are tight
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good - some people say they are tight, they may be a little tight at first but they stretch very quickly. I wear them a lot after a bone bruise on the side of my foot, just for extra support. The interior is pretty hot - probably too hot with socks on. Good sturdy sole that can be taken outdoors - I have walked down the street in these before. Kinda goofy looking, but does the job. Daughter loves to untie them...........so they also keep the kids amused.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Wears too quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered these mocs. They are comfortable but it's been 5 months now and the inside lining is starting to show wear. The dye is also fading. Add'l comment: the sole is cracking. I would never consider this moccasin again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... moccasins/slippers are without a doubt one of the most comfortable pair of footwear that I have ever put on ...
customer_reviews.text: These moccasins/slippers are without a doubt one of the most comfortable pair of footwear that I have ever put on my feet. The lining on the inside of this pair is both soft and comfortable for wearing all day and night both around the house. The sturdy soles on the bottom of these moccasins make walking on different outside surfaces very easy. They are both stylish and handsome looking in there appearance. Great job Tamarac you have made an excellent product!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lininger

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these slippers as a present for my husband. He loves them. He wears them all the time, even to the store. They run true to size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally Moccasins That fit!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a moccasin that fits! I wear a size 10. This moccasin fits my feet perfectly. Usually moccasins, regardless of brand, tend to run small. These don’t (at least for me). I usually have to return them when I buy online. I’ve returned quite a few in my day. These l’ll be keeping. Although I don’t like the fact they’re made in China, they do appear to be well made. I have no other issues with then. For this reason, I recommend them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality slippers for cold feet!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 of these and was great to see the Wide option. Latest version runs a bit small - Bought the 10W (normal shoe size) but ended up with 11W which were perfect. Highly recommend these - high quality, warm and last for 3-4 years (indoors)!
customer_reviews.author: Happy in SD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third pair of theses slippers. I was wearing my latest pair by a campfire and had the slipper get a little too close to the flame. It really was nice and warm until the sole started to melt. Now I am buying another pair. It was my fault. So...great slipper but don't get them too close to the campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Beaudiem

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and warm
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and warm. The only problem I had is that the shoestring broke when I tightened it. Fortunately, it broke at a point that allowed me to still tighten and tie it. Had it broken further down, I would have had to disassemble the shoe since it holds the top of the shoe to the bottom. That would have been a real job. The manufacturer should change the string to nylon or other material that is more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! All the floors in my house are hard (laminate and tiles), so warm shoes are a must this time of year. My existing pair did not fit well, had no furry lining, and were a bit slippery. THESE shoes fit just right, are fluffy and warm inside, and have way better traction. I just got them, so I cannot comment about durability, but the quality seems very good. I would have been satisfied if I has paid more...I never say that. My reviews are often like "for the money, yadda, yadda, yadda." Not this time: these shoes are a BARGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: i did order these 1/2 size smaller than my usual size (10.5) .They do fit as expected with moderate support. They aren't as good as the Rckprt indor/outdoor mocassin , so I am a lttle disappointed. The laces on top started to untie after a few weeks. I am constantly having to retie them a few times a day. i frustrated with these slippers and too late to return them. Back to looking for a different pair of indoor/outdoor slipper mocassins with arch support
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Slippers!
customer_reviews.text: Go into a department store and into the men's shoe department. Ask the clerk where the slippers are. You get the "deer in the headlights" look! Ordered these on Amazon expecting the size would not be right but a pleasant surprise...they fit perfectly! Plush faux fur lining and hard rubber soles can be worn indoors or out. I wear them with sweat sox and take a size 10m....ordered them in size 10 and perfecto! Price was right too!
customer_reviews.author: BobC

customer_reviews.title: If you are like me that work from home and plan to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me that work from home and plan to wear it all day then its average not good or great, its just okay. Reason are the my heal hurt really bad if I wear them all they. Of all my shoes this are the only one that I had that problem. It suggest me that the sole aren't cushioning enough. Its warm but not like super warm. My feet still get cold and some times its colder than any other part of my body when I wear them. To summarize they are 2X warmer as regular shoes.
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: These slippers run large..very!
customer_reviews.text: Slippers are beautiful and appear to be good quality. Stitching, sole and insides look to be solid, but they run so much bigger than other slippers of this kind. After reading about 20 reviews of slippers similar to these, I decided to go with my son's true size of 15; these slippers were huge. After trying them on and measuring them against 13's, 14's and other 15's, we actually decided a 13 would work as they will stretch. We haven't received the new ones yet so I cannot attest to the long term quality - that will need to be a 2nd review.
customer_reviews.author: Christine King-Routheau

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers, fit as exoected.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue we've had was the laces they have just fallen off of both pairs. My husband would prefer if they actually tied like other brands do, these are just tied as decoration. We've boughten 2 pairs so far the first was only ruined bc of rain and snow (his outside pair). They lasted just over a year with steady wearing outside. His new pair is also outside only use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable & Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancee as a gift and he loved them. Very affordable, great quality and they look just like the picture. He says they are comfortable and fit great. Great gift to give!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, all around slipper
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have bought of these slippers. Good slippers and sole is hard enough to wear outdoors if needed. Biggest disappointment is the laces seem to be a cheap synthetic and not the thick leather the first ones had. I can see these breaking in the future. Even though very comfortable, the foam soles do break down rather quickly(still comfortable but not as much).
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: I normally would not get so enthusiastic about a simple pair of slippers, but these were surprisingly great, for two reasons. First, a wide size was available, and these fit perfectly. Secondly, the hard sole allows you to wear them in places that could damage normal slippers (e.g., outside) without worry. Seem like they are constructed well and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great moccasins for indoor and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these moccasins because they are suitable for indoor and limited outdoor use throughout the year. They are well-made and generally hold up well. When my current moccasins seem to be needing replacement, I always order a spare to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: BC Kiefner

customer_reviews.title: Weather Tight Soles, Well Attached Uppers
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and have durable soles. They are okay for quick trips to get things out of the car or bring the trash cans back and forth over damp grass, if you dance carefully to keep the grass off the upper fabric. They seem built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Best slipper made
customer_reviews.text: Have bought at least a dozen of these. Not because they do not hold up. They old up very well. Just not a match for a 1 year old lab. If not careful, they become hers. It's real easy to forget to "hang up" your shoes. These have very good rubber/poly/? soles. They can take a beating and still look good. Best, they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Stage Two - From Shoes To Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since my FIL had a foot injury. He won't get off his bad foot but at least we bought him wearable slippers to cushion the foot. A little hot, but he uses it most of the time now so that's good! Bought the E width and seems to be fine for a size 10 foot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft on the inside
customer_reviews.text: Super soft on the inside. Very durable sole as well. When they're on sale they're a great deal. Well they're the same price as the Minnetonkas, go with the tonks
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Warm comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 10 1/2 US shoe, so I ordered these slippers in size 11 since they didn’t offer 1/2 sizes. When he first put them on, he thought they were too small. Fortunately he kept them on and changed his mind. Within a couple of days, the fit had loosened, and he now loves them. He said they are warm and comfortable, and he likes the style. We bought the black color.
customer_reviews.author: Wren Cottage

customer_reviews.title: Tamarac Slippers - True Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my spouse for Christmas. Had to send first pair back, ordered a larger size and they were both too wide and too long.. Returned these and while these were making their way back, the new order was shipped. Spouse loves these because they are a 2E and fit his foot perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JJunk2

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable when they ship the correct size. Meaning what is shipped is not mislabeled by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I have owned over the last few years 3 pairs of these slippers. Each time I have ordered the exact same size and had to return them because they did not fit. Though the replacement slippers always have? I buy them because when they fit they are very comfortable and I hate going to a Mall to buy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Katz

customer_reviews.title: they are pretty tight around my big and second toes and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5D but went with the 10 because slippers typically seem to run large when you have to buy in full sizes. While these fit in the length, they are pretty tight around my big and second toes and the side next to the balls of my feet. It seems that if you're in the half size, go with the wider 2E version. At least they seem to be made of good quality materials and look like they will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have excellent quality and are very comfortable, but having to purchase in full sizes rather than half resulted in my right slipper being just a bit too loose. Not a big deal. Apparently my two feet are not both exactly the same size. Not worth sending back. I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Stammerjohan

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Heel and Very Little Support
customer_reviews.text: After receiving slippers, I had to buy an insert for better support. Also, within a week the back heel sides collapsed - not rigid enough. So now I either have to walk on the back heel sides or lift them up with my hands. Later, the lining inside ithe sides of the slipper is coming out.. Wow, what a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: jn1

customer_reviews.title: ... girlfriend got him a pair of these and he loved them so I purchased my husband and grandfather a ...
customer_reviews.text: My brothers girlfriend got him a pair of these and he loved them so I purchased my husband and grandfather a pair. They have had them for about a month now and everyone absolutely loves them. My husband wears his around the house constantly and so far no ripped stitching or anything as some reviews have said, and they were true to the size as well
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Well made, warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: Warm, very well made. I do wish I had ordered it a bit larger because I like to wear with thick socks around the house (Hey, I keep it cool!) As a size, it fits fine with thinner socks or no socks, much like a shoe. Would recommend it as a very well made slipper at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Hudson Valley Guy

product_meta.title: Tamarac by Slippers International 7161 Men's Camper Moccasin
product_meta.description: *Kick back and relax in this comfortable classic *Suede leather upper with moccasin-style stitching detail *Faux fur lining for cozy warmth *Cushioning Memory Foam footbed *Flexible, indoor/outdoor rubber-like sole *Available in whole sizes only, half sizes please order the next size up
feature_bullets: Classic moccasin slipper featuring whipstitching at toe and flexible indoor/outdoor sole
